reviews.review: It basically exists to milk us like cows and its addictive.
I once had a family, a life. I have none now. It is all csgo. There is no reason to live but to get headshots.
Mesmo depois de tantos anos, continua sendo um jogo excelente e prazeroso. A dinâmica é o crucial, jogo sem delongas. O único problema continua sendo o uso de trapaças que atrapalham muito.

I used to love this game, but I can't play it anymore because they've changed it too much. If you don't use the guns they want you to use and use a play style like they do in the esports community then you're penalized for it in your game play. It's not fun anymore because it is too much like any MOBA, where there's a specific way to play and if you don't adhere to that style your kicked from nearly any ranked match. I feel it also doesn't have the community behind it like CS: Source did. I still play it every once in awhile to see if anything has changed but more often than not I find that new changes to things like maps make them less fun and more "competitive".
bom o sistema de skins e muito bom .... a me pulpe vcs ja
